resources.string: Simulation of a "Home" button click which acts as a quick access to your home screen.
Full application drawer "on the go", opens above any opened app.
Switch between your recently used applications and improve your multitask skills.
Makes your device super-smooth by clearing unnesseseraly taken memory.
Toggle between the current app and the last one used, Multitask at it\'s prime!
Simulation of a "Search" button click which usually opens your device\'s defaulted search app.
Opens the default voice commands application if your device supports it.
Get the current battery level of your device in 1% accuracy.
Contact with your friends easily with One-Click dial/sms actions.
Light up the darkest room with the quick flashlight action.
Quick access to system toggles like Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Brightness level and more.
Sorry, this action is currently not supported on Android v5.0 and above.
